String.Source: Any interesting news, rumors...thoughts?
String.Dest: 对时下的消息、传闻……你怎么看？

String.Source: Any interesting news, rumors...thoughts?
String.Dest: 对时下的消息、传闻……你怎么看？

String.Source: That sounds like a horrible deal.
String.Dest: 听起来是笔糟透了的交易。

String.Source: A true knight does not require coin to do what is right.
String.Dest: 一个真正的骑士是因自己的信念而行动的，而不是为钱而行动。

String.Source: There's more to life than gold.
String.Dest: 生活中有比金钱更重要的。

String.Source: An excellent trade good sir, where should I deposit the gold?
String.Dest: 真是一次棒极了的交易，好心的先生，那么我该把这些金币放在哪里呢？

String.Source: An excellent trade good sir, where should I deposit the gold?
String.Dest: 真是一次棒极了的交易，好心的先生，那么我该把这些金币放在哪里呢？

String.Source: Killing dragons can be quite profitable.
String.Dest: 屠龙肯定能大赚一笔的。

String.Source: Why should I choose you over Belrand?
String.Dest: 给个让我选你而不是Belrand的理由？

String.Source: Why should I choose you over Belrand?
String.Dest: 给个让我选你而不是Belrand的理由？

String.Dest: 给个让我选你而不是Belrand的理由？

String.Source: Why should I choose you over Belrand?
String.Dest: 给个让我选你而不是Belrand的理由？

String.Dest: 给个让我选你而不是Belrand的理由？

String.Source: Why should I choose you over Belrand?
String.Dest: 给个让我选你而不是Belrand的理由？

String.Source: That's a little too rich for my blood.
String.Dest: 那有点太贵了。

String.Source: That's a little too rich for my blood.
String.Dest: 那有点太贵了。

String.Source: I will pay thrice your fee, if you prove your loyalty by slicing off a finger.
String.Dest: 如果你能切下一根手指来证明你的忠诚，我会付给你三倍报酬。

String.Source: I will pay thrice your fee, if you prove your loyalty by slicing off a finger.
String.Dest: 如果你能切下一根手指来证明你的忠诚，我会付给你三倍报酬。

String.Source: So you're saying he does neither well.
String.Dest: 你的意思是说他什么都做不好？

String.Source: So you're saying he does neither well.
String.Dest: 你的意思是说他什么都做不好？

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事吧。

String.Source: You're just a tool I need to help me complete a pilgrimage.
String.Dest: 你只能算是我的朝圣之旅上一块垫脚石。.

String.Source: You're badly misreading the mercenary market.
String.Dest: 你严重地错估了市场上的买卖双方。

String.Source: Consider yourself hired. (1000 Gold)
String.Dest: 你被雇佣了。(1000金币)

String.Source: Consider yourself hired. (1000 Gold)
String.Dest: 你被雇佣了。(1000金币)

String.Source: Exactly. Specialization is key. The question is, what's yours.
String.Dest: 很对。特长是关键。但问题是你的特别之处在哪里？

String.Source: Exactly. Specialization is key. The question is, what's yours.
String.Dest: 很对。特长是关键。但问题是你的特别之处在哪里？

String.Source: Exactly. Specialization is key. The question is, what's yours.
String.Dest: 很对。特长是关键。但问题是你的特别之处在哪里？

String.Source: You should care. The world could very well end tomorrow.
String.Dest: 你应该小心，明天很可能就是世界末日。

String.Source: I'll give you 1200. I think that's more than fair.
String.Dest: 我会给你1200。我觉得这可不少。

String.Source: So I should hire the idiot who does nothing well instead?
String.Dest: 那么我应该雇佣一个什么都干不好的傻瓜？

String.Source: So I should hire the idiot who does nothing well instead?
String.Dest: 那么我应该雇佣一个什么都干不好的傻瓜？

String.Source: I actually need to hire you for a specific job.
String.Dest: 我还真需要雇你做一个特殊的任务。

String.Source: All I need is your blessing, not your blade.
String.Dest: 我需要的只是你的祝福，而不是武力。

String.Source: You will be the champion of Zenithar and carry the banner of the Divines.
String.Dest: 你将会成为泽尼萨尔的勇士，以圣灵的名义行事。

String.Source: I noticed you charge twice as much as any other mercenary.
String.Dest: 你比一般的雇佣兵要价高一倍呀！

String.Source: My thoughts exactly.
String.Dest: 我就是这么想的。

String.Source: A fish pie sounds incredibly delicious. I'll go hire Belrand then.
String.Dest: 一个鱼饼，听起来是挺美味的哈。我会去雇博兰德然后让他给我做这个的。

String.Source: A fish pie sounds incredibly delicious. I'll go hire Belrand then.
String.Dest: 一个鱼饼，听起来是挺美味的哈。我会去雇博兰德然后让他给我做这个的。

String.Source: Keep the drink, and I'll keep my money.
String.Dest: 你留着你的酒，我省下我的钱。

String.Source: I have no idea what you just said, but it sounds expensive. 1200 gold ought to do it.
String.Dest: 我搞不懂你刚都说了什么，但觉得很厉害的样子。1200 金币该给的值。

String.Source: You're a little short on coin. Best go gather up some more.
String.Dest: 你给的钱有点儿少，最好再去凑一些。

String.Source: Just the basics. Sword and shield. No fancy knight training. What I know, they don't teach you in any tourney.
String.Dest: 随便耍两招而已。挥挥剑举举盾什么的，不是潇洒的骑士训练。我猜骑士训练的时候练不了什么有用的东西。

String.Source: It's pretty simple. In this world, you got people who want other people dead. They pay me to kill them.
String.Dest: 相当简单。世界上有人希望别人去死，就花钱雇我弄死他们。

String.Source: I don't think you understand how this works. You pay me gold to slice off someone else's finger.
String.Dest: 我想你还不了解这事儿是怎么办的。你付钱给我帮你剁掉某人的手指头。

String.Source: Now that's what I'm talking about. Let's go.
String.Dest: 那才是我要说的重点。我们走吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, had I known you had the coin, I would've said 10,000 gold pieces.
String.Dest: （笑）我要是知道你那么有钱，我就管你要一万块啦。

String.Source: The choice is as clear as the reasons, brother.
String.Dest: 兄弟，这还需要理由么。

String.Source: In that case, you might be alright with Belrand. It's not like he's some decrepit old sellsword with a brain the size of my balls. Oh wait.
String.Dest: 在那种情况下，你是能与博兰德友好相处的。哪怕那老佣兵的脑子还没我的蛋蛋大。哦等等。

String.Source: Belrand likes to say you can go for a swordsman or spellcaster, but not why not have both?
String.Dest: Belrand总喜欢说：你可以去当个剑客或施法者，但为什么不能两者兼得呢？

String.Source: Belrand likes to say you can go for a swordsman or spellcaster, but not why not have both?
String.Dest: Belrand总喜欢说：你可以去当个剑客或施法者，但为什么不能两者兼得呢？

String.Source: Then that person pays me more gold to slice off yours. Everybody wins.
String.Dest: 然后那个家伙会付我更多的钱来干掉你，共赢。

String.Source: Don't say I didn't warn you. Actually, you probably won't be saying much of anything with that old man at your back.
String.Dest: 别说我没提醒过你。事实上，你可能不会和躲在你身后的老人多说些什么。

String.Source: Of course, if one day the bandits all trade in their blades for jousting spears, then by all means, find yourself a knight.
String.Dest: 当然，如果哪天强盗都愿意跟你点到为止的话，那你差不多可以去做个骑士了。

String.Source: Well, I'd almost do it for free, except I don't know what that word means. If I had to take a guess, it means 1200 septims.
String.Dest: 嗯，我其实挺想免费的，只是我不明白那个词的意思。要是非让我猜，大概是表示1200金币吧。

String.Source: Why, you looking to hire yourself? (Laughs) Because you can't be talking about me.
String.Dest: 为什么，你想雇你自己么？(笑声)因为你无法评价我。

String.Source: Well, that's because you didn't let me finish. You get more than a drink. You get a tough son of a bitch like me by your side.
String.Dest: 没错，那是因为你没有让我说完。你得到的可比一杯酒多多啦。你都说服一个像我这样的混账呆在你身边了。

String.Source: My only opinion on the dragons is that I don't care.
String.Dest: 我对龙的唯一看法是，我不在乎。

String.Source: It's not like all those skulls scattered around Skyrim bashed themselves in!
String.Dest: 你以为天际的那些王八蛋们都是怎么死的！

String.Source: Probably. So's killing men. I'll stick to what I know.
String.Dest: 或许吧，其实杀人也挺容易来钱的。我只会这个。

String.Source: Otherwise, you're better off paying me.
String.Dest: 另外，你最好一次性付清钱。

String.Source: The choice is as clear as the reasons, sister.
String.Dest: 妹子，这还需要理由么。

String.Source: More to life than gold, huh. Say...that's pretty deep. I'll remember to carve it on your tombstone.
String.Dest: 金币诚可贵，生命价更高，嗯...这很深奥。我会记得把它刻在我的墓碑上。

String.Source: Right in my pockets is a good place to start. Then maybe my coin purse, and my sack too. Or just dump it on the table, I'm not all that picky.
String.Dest: 我的右边衣兜儿是个好地方。还有我的钱包，我的口袋。或者干脆把它放在桌子上好了，我没那么多事儿的。

String.Source: I've been called worse. In fact, "tool" pretty much sums up what I do. And this tool costs about 1500 gold to use.
String.Dest: 要我说，还不如垫脚石呢。事实上，“垫脚石”大概概括了我能干什么。并且垫脚石的使用费大概是1500个金币。

String.Source: Is that right? Didn't really think about it. Just tried to put a number on what you're getting.
String.Dest: 是吗？真的没有想过。还只是信口开河。

String.Source: Hey brother, you look thirsty. Tell you what, you give me 1000 gold pieces, and I'll buy you a drink.
String.Dest: 嗨伙计，你看上去渴了，告诉你吧，如果你给我1000个金币，我就给你买点喝的来！

String.Source: You got yourself a deal. And don't worry, you're getting the better end of it.
String.Dest: 你给自己找了点麻烦。不过别担心，结果肯定会更好的。

String.Source: And I ain't one to brag, but I still think you'd be getting a discount.
String.Dest: 不是我吹牛，我真觉得你应该得到【折扣】的啊。

String.Source: True, but a thousand gold covers regular mercenary work. For this kind of special request, I'll need about 200 more.
String.Dest: 没错，不过一千金币只是常规价。要接你这种特殊的活儿，我得多要200块。

String.Source: Hey, I'm just a dumb old merc, don't know nothing about anything. But I'll lower my prices when people stop paying them.
String.Dest: 嘿，我只是个粗俗的老佣兵，对所有事情都一无所知。但我知道在没人愿意花钱雇我的时候应该把价钱压低。

String.Source: You keep the clink flowing, and I'll be more than happy to buy you more drinks. Might even offer you my blade, if you're in need of it.
String.Dest: 只要我能一直听见金币的响声，然后我说不定一时开心就多请你几杯酒了。甚至如果你需要的话，我甚至可以为你效劳。

String.Source: Hey sister, you look thirsty. Tell you what, you give me 1000 gold pieces, and I'll buy you a drink.
String.Dest: 嗨姐姐，你看起来很渴啊。告诉你吧，给我1000金币，我就给你买喝的。

String.Source: So we're in complete agreement. Knights are dumb.
String.Dest: 所以我们完全同意。骑士们都是哑巴。

String.Source: He likes to say that a lot, "Why not have both?" I'll tell you why.
String.Dest: 他总是这样说，“为什么不呢？”我会告诉你为什么。

String.Source: He likes to say that a lot, "Why not have both?" I'll tell you why.
String.Dest: 他总是这样说，“为什么不呢？”我会告诉你为什么。

String.Source: My next opinion of the war will be my first.
String.Dest: 我对战争的观点跟上一个一样。

String.Source: You got that right. They pay us to kill, not to care.
String.Dest: 你说对了。他们付钱，我们杀人，别往心里去。

String.Source: I tend to have only happy thoughts. Mostly because I only think about one thing. It's round, gold, and buys me mead.
String.Dest: 我很乐观。很大程度是因为我只考虑一个东西。它是圆的，金光闪闪的，还能换取蜂蜜酒。

String.Source: But sure, keep your gold, spill your blood. It's not like it's less painful inside your body or anything.
String.Dest: 但是确实，卖命拿钱。想不出血就过上好日子是不可能的。

String.Source: It's just the way it is. Maybe if you're some kind of genius you could pull it off. Or maybe if you're young and fast enough, it won't matter.
String.Dest: 本来就是。如果你天赋异禀的话就可以横扫全天际了。或者说你身强体壮，动作敏捷，也能混得下去。

String.Source: It's like you're out for a meal, and you got a choice of pie, or fish. Belrand is like a pie made out of fish. Why not have both? That's why.
String.Dest: 就像你出去吃饭，然后你得选你是吃鱼还是吃馅饼。博兰德就像是一个鱼肉馅饼。

String.Source: It's like you're out for a meal, and you got a choice of pie, or fish. Belrand is like a pie made out of fish. Why not have both? That's why.
String.Dest: 就像你出去吃饭，然后你得选你是吃鱼还是吃馅饼。博兰德就像是一个鱼肉馅饼。

String.Source: Yeah? It might cost you extra, depending on how dangerous it is. Hell, make it dangerous enough, and it might cost you less. But it'll still cost.
String.Dest: 啥？也许会额外花费你很多东西，当然这和他到底有多危险有关。见鬼，越是危险花的就越少。但是花肯定是要花。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 要不是我父亲那晚上被困在独孤城了，卫兵们才抓不到他呢。

String.Source: I was just about suggest that myself. You need me again, you come by the Skeever. And bring money.
String.Dest: 我几乎就让我那么干了。你又一次需要我了，你抓到了雪鼠，还带来了钱。
